documents.document:
Champions!!

Real Madrid r da lig champions 4 da 30th tym...um one of da mos happy person in da world..........

SHIT!

Result of our final xam is on da 29th of dis month... I m very worried cos dis tym da question paper was hell lotta tufer dan ma previous xam...lets c wat fate has in store 4 me...

Awww man!

Ma skul clsd on da 19th of dis month nd its opening on da 29th of next month... So um getting a vacation of only 1 month nd 10 days whereas i ve heard dat in oder skls da vacation iz a bit longer... so um feeling a li'l bit jealous... u kno..

Henry 2 Barca!

Henry joins Barca... so next season it vil b much more tufer 4 Real Madrid 2 win da spanish primera... Henry alone can b da difference.... SO Madrid vil ve 2 cum up wid sth special 2 keep deir name in da top of da spanish primera intact.... bye bye..

---Devils never cry---

Steel a soul for a second chance
But you will never become a man
My chosen torture makes me stronger
In a life that craves the hunger
A Freedom and a quest for life
Until the end the judgment night

Stepping forth a cure for soul's demise
Reap the tears of the victim’s cries
Yearning more to hear the suffer
Of a demon as I put it under

Killed before, a time to kill them all
Passed down the righteous law
Serve a justice that dwells in me
Lifeless corpse as far as the eye can see

<< Taste da blood >>

The flinch in your eye calls your bluff
Feel free to die when you've had enough
Useless cause is breaking your back
Your life will end when you attack

Make your move
Make your stand
Make the win
(ha..) Like you can

See the war
See me rule
See the mirror
You’ll see a fool

To take me out you must fight like a man
You've yet to prove that you can (you’ve yet to prove me that you can)
I see your might and it compares to something
That is if something is nothing

Time to figure
Time to sin
Your times done
When you begin

Live for suffer
Now your life
Comes to an end

Taste the blood
Taste your fate
Swallow your pride
With your hate

Your last breathe
Your last stance
The last of all
In your command

Knee’s in the (blood) with your crying pleas
Wade in your sorrow, bathe in your fear
Clear the mind from righteousness suffered
Witness the moment of (your) failures prosper

Hi

Is there any Devil May Cry fan out dere? I wud luv 2 meet him or her..

...

2day i gt da result 4 dis year's final xam... nd i ve reached a conclusion - in order 2 do better i need 2 rectify maself a lot... my parents r very disappointed... dey expected a lot better 4 me... i let dem down dis tym... i can consider myself lucky 4 getting 597 out of 700 widout commiting myself 2 my studies... i guess if i dont commit more i vil b doomed.. got nthng else 2 say .. um depressed nd broken.. rilly lyf iz too tuf..

Plz check dis out!

I ve some powerz of intuition
May b its just an innervision
Bt ppl follow me widout n e hesitation
In aggravating situations
Widout making any justification
I prefer meditation
Instead of intoxication
Cos it increases ma concentration
So I can perform operations
And make quick eliminations
Using da most appropriate ammunitions
In different locations
Widout a lot of perforations
I don’t kno da meaning of deviation
So um suffering 4m depression
Dats y I cant learn differentiation
Bt in ma o-levels I want 2 get distinctions
Misplaced thoughts need eradications
It shud also b applied in da case of equivocation
U gotta get punished 4 extortion
Liquid and water can never result in emulsification
Even if u do some modifications
Cos only one of dem is a solution
I wanted full satisfaction
I hate imperfections
So I ve tried 2 prevent any exclusions
In ma so called poem or rap song ..n e wayz it comes 2 a conclusion..
Hey guys I gotta go.. cos I think I need some medications.
Wait… Is there any word called californication?

I made dis up so afta reading dis rate dis! and give ur comments!

Shahir's blog- for da latest news on soccer

Guys, I ve created a blog which is fully dedicated 2 soccer.. if u r a soccer fan, den pls check it out. click on dis link http://shahir07.blogspot.com , if it doesnt work try dis link http://www.debonairdemon.tk

~~~~~...........

Celebrated ma 15th birthday 2day.. nd u kno wat .. it wasnt dat gud.. i also dint feel dat happy cos i ve lost another precious year of my life...i assume um moving closer 2 death.. so y shud i celebrate?
